name: The Legend of Yan Loong 1+2
description:
Classic side-scrolling action game is back, fully optimizing the game experience and adding exquisite opening animations!

“The Legend of Yan Loong" aka “Yan Loong Legend” series of games features exquisite game graphics, excellent combat sense, refreshing combo system, and a two-player mode that allows you to cooperate with friends to overcome levels. As early as the Flash game era, it had become a popular side-scrolling action game series popular among players around the world. Now "The Legend of Yan Loong 1+2" is a nostalgic collections of the chapter 1 and 2 of the series. In this collection the game operation is fully optimized and an exquisite opening animations, a Game Gallery that including game character portraits and game covers of each version are added. Pick up your sword again, transform into Yan Loong, Zhi Loong or Shui Yan with your friends to complete your mission, have a battle of light and darkness with the final boss Bai Loong, regain the occupied Green Hill Lake, and start a nostalgic journey to eradicate evil.


Features

  • Excellent hits feeling, giving you a perfect fighting experience!
  • A refreshing combo system. When using combos to hit enemies, the higher the number of combo hits, the more experience points the character will gain.
  • Integrated into the level up system from RPG games, you can gain experience points by defeating enemies to level up your characters.
  • Each character has several different qigong and skills, which can be learned as the character levels up.
  • Starting from "The Double Dragon", a two-player mode has been added. From now on, you no longer have to fight alone and experience the fun of cooperating with friends to overcome levels.
  • Starting from "The 2nd Impact", a character ability points allocation system has been added. Every time a character level up, he will get a certain ability points. You can allocate it yourself. Try to use different ability points allocation strategies every time you start a new game!
  • Starting from "The 3rd Impact", a striker system has been added. If you defeat the BOSS with a certain number of combo hits, you can conquer him to help us. You can call him to assist in the battle.
  • Up to 17 levels with different terrains are waiting for you to challenge.
  • More than ten kinds of enemies proficient in various skills and difficult BOSS are ambushing in the level. Use Qigong or combo skills to defeat them to advance!
  • A variety of items make your battle easier, they can restore your HP, energy or increase your life.
  • The system will automatically save after every level you pass, so you can continue playing next time without having to start from the begining.

What's new in this collection

  • Exquisite opening animation, accompanied by beautiful music, relive the beautiful memories of the Yan loong series of games that accompany you in the past.
  • A game gallery has been added, including exquisite portraits of all characters in the game and the covers of each version of the game.
  • You can choose from a variety of game screen sizes, including original size, original aspect ratio and full-screen stretching.
  • You can choose from up to twelve different game wallpapers in the original screen size.
  • Game control can be customized at any time while the game is in progress.
  • The game can be reset and ended at any time, making it easy to replay or switch to another game.
  • Not only can you play in window mode, you can also play in full-screen mode to experience a more impactful graphic.
